lines.text: Hey man, I don't buy no pussy.
Lyle, you are stupid! You don't fight with a bull that big, you shoot it!
How would you like to be pickin' your teeth outta your lips?

you were hired to give me some protection, a little peace and quiet. I got half this town on the payroll - cash, hard cash. To get blasted by a couple of maniacs? Well, money won't buy you brains. Get out! Out!
